siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Follab is a platform for collect, organize and analyze customer feedback. No more outdated spreadsheets, caothic Trello boards or try to keep track of everything in Slack.
blogPost.body: Follab is a platform for collect, organize and analyze customer feedback. No more outdated spreadsheets, caothic Trello boards or try to keep track of everything in Slack.
blogPost.title: Follab - Capture, organize, and analyze customer feedback
blogPost.author: Matias Carpintini.

localize.description: Follab是一个收集、整理和分析客户反馈的平台。不再有过时的电子表格、caothic的Trello板或试图在Slack中跟踪一切。
localize.tagline: 收集、整理、分析客户反馈

localize.description: Follab是一個收集、整理和分析客戶反饋的平臺。不再有過時的電子表格、caothic的Trello板或試圖在Slack中跟蹤一切。
localize.tagline: 收集、整理、分析客戶反饋

previous.excerpt: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.
previous.title: Draftshot for Dribbble - Predict how popular your shot might be on Dribbble

localize.description: Draftshot是一款应用，它可以在你上传到Dribbble之前就预测你的镜头可能会有多受欢迎。无论是logo、网页设计还是插画，都不在话下。Draftshot使用机器学习来预测任何设计的受欢迎程度。
localize.tagline: 预测你的投篮在Dribbble上的受欢迎程度。

localize.description: Draftshot是一款應用，它可以在你上傳到Dribbble之前就預測你的鏡頭可能會有多受歡迎。無論是logo、網頁設計還是插畫，都不在話下。Draftshot使用機器學習來預測任何設計的受歡迎程度。
localize.tagline: 預測你的投籃在Dribbble上的受歡迎程度。

next.excerpt: Just as the Trello board revolutionized team collaboration by making it visual, simple, and fun for anyone, Trello’s new views are taking teamwork to places never seen before.
next.title: The New Trello - Going beyond the board

localize.description: 正如Trello板通过使其可视化、简单化和对任何人来说都很有趣而彻底改变了团队协作，Trello的新视图正在将团队协作带到前所未有的地方。
正如Trello板通過使其可視化、簡單化和對任何人來說都很有趣而徹底改變了團隊協作，Trello的新視圖正在將團隊協作帶到前所未有的地方。
